front.title: IEEE Standard for Mobile Radiation Monitors Used for Homeland Security

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The operational and performance requirements for mobile radiation monitors (MRMs) used in homeland security applications are specified in this standard. MRMs may be operated while in motion or while in a fixed location. The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the partnership with the Department of Homeland Security Domestic Nuclear Detection Office and the IEEE GET Program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=83
